Botanico Wine & Beer Garden is starting a game collection for your enjoyment. We have Jenga, Chess, Card Monopoly, Relatively Insantiy and What do you Meme! ... or bring your own!!!

Monday Night - Happy Hour All Night!!! 
Regular $3.00 and Large $3.50

Big THANK YOU to Boardgames and Puzzles for all your support!!!
title: Boardgames and Beers!

description:
Every Tuesday Kizomba teachers Buru and Svetlana will be teaching you how to move in this sensual dance originated in Africa. Come alone or with the partner, no special skills or previous training required!

Join us at 7 pm Every Tuesday followed by 𝗦𝗼𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗞𝗶𝘇𝗼𝗺𝗯𝗮 𝗱𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴!

What: 𝗞𝗶𝘇𝗼𝗺𝗯𝗮 𝗖𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘀 & 𝗦𝗼𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗗𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲
When: 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗧𝘂𝗲𝘀𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝗮𝘁 𝟳𝗽𝗺
Where: 𝗔𝘇𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗕𝗮𝗿 & 𝗚𝗿𝗶𝗹𝗹
Fee: $𝟳 𝗽𝗽
title: Kizomba Dance Class in Azure

description:
Every Wednesday Swing dance teachers 𝗝𝗼𝗲𝘆 & 𝗔𝗻𝗻𝗮 will be teaching any of you dance enthusiasts how to swing for free!

Join us at 8 pm Every Wednesday for the beginner class followed by 𝗦𝗼𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗗𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝟵𝗽𝗺!

When: 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗪𝗲𝗱𝗻𝗲𝘀𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝗮𝘁 𝟴𝗽𝗺
Where: 𝗔𝘇𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗕𝗮𝗿 & 𝗚𝗿𝗶𝗹𝗹
Fee: 𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘
title: Swing Dance Class in Azure

description:
Ladies rule supreme at PCCG every other Thursday at Phnom Climb! 

Perks*: 
Active Phnom Climb Members can bring a female friend to climb for free! 
2-for-1 promo: Two female climbers can come in for the price of a single day pass. 
*Gear rental not included. 

For more information, visit our website: https://www.phnomclimb.com/events.htmlhttps://www.phnomclimb.com/events.html
title: Ladies Night!

description:
Thank you teachers!  You mean so much to all of us. Take some well-deserved downtime on Thursday evenings at Botanico where you can enjoy as much of our famous craft beer as you like for only $10 from 6-8pm.
Craft Beer+Friends+Botanico=Serenity.

description:
City-side, ~40K team bicycle city-wide scavenger hunt race. 
All types of bikes welcome. Must have helmet. Will be required to do fun, silly, hard things at checkpoints, may or may not involve questionable acts.

NOT CHILD friendly event.
Any kind of bike ok.

Teams: 
3 or 4 People

Must have at least:
2 Countries
2 Genders

6-10 Checkpoints
Prizes!
BBQ, Beer + Lunch to Follow

VOLUNTEERS:
We need 16 volunteers to be at checkpoints and be part of the creative team. If interested, please message us. 

More Details and meeting location to follow.
title: 1st Annual Amatak Alleycat Race

description:
Every Tuesday Kizomba teachers Buru and Svetlana will be teaching you how to move in this sensual dance originated in Africa. Come alone or with the partner, no special skills or previous training required!

Join us at 7 pm Every Tuesday followed by 𝗦𝗼𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗞𝗶𝘇𝗼𝗺𝗯𝗮 𝗱𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴!

What: 𝗞𝗶𝘇𝗼𝗺𝗯𝗮 𝗖𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘀 & 𝗦𝗼𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗗𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲
When: 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗧𝘂𝗲𝘀𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝗮𝘁 𝟳𝗽𝗺
Where: 𝗔𝘇𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗕𝗮𝗿 & 𝗚𝗿𝗶𝗹𝗹
Fee: $𝟳 𝗽𝗽
title: Kizomba Dance Class in Azure

description:
Every Wednesday Swing dance teachers 𝗝𝗼𝗲𝘆 & 𝗔𝗻𝗻𝗮 will be teaching any of you dance enthusiasts how to swing for free!

Join us at 8 pm Every Wednesday for the beginner class followed by 𝗦𝗼𝗰𝗶𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗗𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝟵𝗽𝗺!

What: 𝗦𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗗𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝗖𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘀 - 𝗕𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀
When: 𝗘𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗪𝗲𝗱𝗻𝗲𝘀𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝗮𝘁 𝟴𝗽𝗺
Where: 𝗔𝘇𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗕𝗮𝗿 & 𝗚𝗿𝗶𝗹𝗹
Fee: 𝗙𝗥𝗘𝗘

title: Ladies Night!

description:
PLEASE BE INFORMED THAT THE EVENT IS POSTPONED TO A LATER DATE ONCE THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC IS OVER. Thank you for your understanding.


Clear your calendar for (date TBC) as Michelin starred Chef Guy Lassausaie* is coming back for another spectacular celebration of fine food, fine wines and fine company with a show-stopping eight-course Dine with the Stars menu.

Tickets for the evening are $125 net or $190 net including our specially selected wine pairing. Reservations are essential.

Please call +855 (0)15 821 888 for a reservation 
Or book your table online with: bit.ly/BookingTopaz

*********
 MENU
*********
AMUSE BOUCHE 
Huître spéciale d'Isigny en gelée,  crème de topinambour, lomo ibérique, confit de citron et mizuna 
Jellied Isigny oyster with Jerusalem artichoke cream, lomo iberico, candied lemon and mizuna 
- Hugel Gentil Alsace 2017 -
  
PATIENCE 
Demoiselle du Mékong au piment d’Espelette,  
jus de carotte vanille et gingembre au fruit de la passion 
Mekong river prawn with Espelette pepper floating on a carrot, vanilla and ginger jus with passion fruit 
- Georges Dubœuf Pouilly-Fuissé 2014 -
  
ENTRÉE 
Noix de Saint-Jacques au beurre noisette, morille jumbo farcie et asperge fraîche 
Brown butter scallops with stuffed jumbo morel and white asparagus 
- Georges Dubœuf Pouilly-Fuissé 2014 -
  
LA MARÉE 
Filet de rouget en demi-deuil, épeautre de céleri et truffes,  
et bouillon de céleri à l’huile de noisette 
Truffled fillet of red mullet, celery and truffle spelt with celeriac broth drizzled with hazelnut oil 
- Château Maucoil, Trésor des Papes 2013 -
  
PAUSE SURPRISE 
Granité de Beaujolais à l’infusion de tilleul 
Beaujolais granita with a lime tea infusion 
  
LA VOLAILLE 
Poitrine de pigeon rôti et crêpe de sarrasin, purée de pois chiches au sésame et cuisses confites, choux de Bruxelles farcis 
Roasted pigeon breast with buckwheat crepe, chickpea purée with sesame, confit of pigeon thighs and stuffed Brussels sprouts 
- Château d'Archambeau Graves 2017 -
  
PRÉ-DESSERT 
Marmelade de pomme et clémentine, sorbet au cidre 
Apple and clementine marmalade with a cider sorbet 
- Domaine Labranche Laffont, Pacherenc du Vic-Bilh Doux 2017 - 
  
DESSERT 
Sablé pamplemousse rose, crémeux pomelos au basilic, confit et sorbet pamplemousse 
Pink grapefruit shortbread, pomelo cream, and grapefruit sorbet with candied grapefruit 
- Domaine Labranche Laffont, Pacherenc du Vic-Bilh Doux 2017 -
title: Michelin-Star Dinner by Guy Lassausaie*
